I'm enjoying this shirt now that our weather has turned chilly in the mornings and evenings. Well made, comfortable, washes well. Looks good. Would definitely purchase more.

This is definitely a ni e soft shirt, sleeves are well made and it's roomy. That being said, the color was NOT what I consider Apricot. It's a lighter gold-ish color.  Not even close to Apricot at all. I will keep it but, I wouldn't recommend this color, ugh.

The color is true, it’s not sweatshirt heavy, but it’s not T-shirt thin, a nice in between, just right for leggings. I normally by XL in shirts, read reviews and got a L, probably could have used a M for a more fitting look, but I’m good with the roomier L, for around the house/errands…LOVE the cuffs! Nice feel. They are 95% rayon so if I dare I can dry it a little in the dryer if I need to shrink it some. The reviews were all right…the pocket is in an odd place, but it barely shows…I myself can’t say I’ve ever actually used a T-shirt pocket anyway. The feel of this shirt is great, just decide on size before ordering….you can always return or replace it for a different size!

I am 5'4 and 145 lbs and purchased a medium. I love it! A large would work just as well depending on your preference. It is super buttery soft, material is good quality, not to thick or thin. Great for leggings, jeans or casual slacks. I purchased 2 and would probably buy more but it just does not get cold enough here in So Tx. Two thumbs up!
Oversized fit and super soft and cozy! Will be purchasing more colors!
Cute style, quality seemed ok but ran about 2 sizes 2 big, even for it being oversized.
Arrived quickly and we’ll packaged. The top, though, was just a long sleeved tee shirt. No style to it, only ok fabric. Color (blue) was nice. I returned it.
Great quality. Love the green!

In the summer, when sitting in the ac, my arms are always cold. Meaning that I always need a long sleeved shirt handy. I typically grab a flannel shirt, but I hate that most, if not all flannels, come in patterns. Never a solid color to be found. So they always clash with what I'm wearing. I found this shirt, which is a lightweight rayon material, that fits the bill. It comes in a plethora of colors, so I'll never be mismatched again. It has a little stretch to it, so it fits over anything I'm already wearing. I appreciate the tight cuff at the wrist. I have small hands and if the sleeves are a little long, it will cover my hands. The cuffs on this shirt keep the arms firmly in place. It also has a pocket on one side of the shirt; a perfect spot for your sunglasses. The shirt feels soft against the skin and washes well. The color stayed and there haven't been any loose strings to speak of. Putting it in the dryer at medium heat and taking it out just before it's totally dry, has led to no shrinkage whatsoever. This is a good quality shirt that looks good and feels good.

My ANRABESS Long Sleeve Shirt is so cute and colorful! It features a gorgeous oversized crewneck! This is a very pretty T-shirt Blouse with a pocket! I selected the color Hot Pink! I definitely LOVE all of the colors! This Tee can be worn casually as a long sleeve T-Shirt or a blouse with a blazer or jacket! I love it!

评论概述: Soft and comfortable long sleeve tee
评论详情: This long sleeve pocket tee is soft, comfortable and fit really well. It has a little stretch in it, too. I don't particularly like how the sleeves are a bit poofy at the cuff, but that could just be me.
This shirt is comfortable and lightweight. Perfect for fall. The pocket detail is nice. Washes well.

I absolutely love this shirt. So soft and comfy. I love the fullness, I normally wear a small, but this medium  has such a comfy vibe. Washed up really nice. I just ordered another one in different color. Recommend for sure. Plus the price is great. Be sure and ✅ the coupon!!

I'm not altogether certain about this shirt - the pluses are that it's an incredibly vibrant color (I bought in green and it's lovely), is super soft, and the fit is very comfortable. It washed up well, as well. I'm just not sure I fully love how it looks on me. The pocket hits in a weird spot and it's quite oversized. Overall, it's a nice shirt and a good value.
This is super soft, comfortable to wear. I love the color and it is very lightweight and thin. Good to use a for a mild cold day with a jacket. Easy to put together for a cute style out,

评论概述: Love the color on the "lake" option
评论详情: What I love most about this top is the color.  It is so perfect, and honestly goes perfectly with a scarf I have, so I am excited for it to be cool enough for me to try them out together.  The fit is pretty much on target.  I usually run between an XL and XXL, and the XL was large enough with this shirt.  The fabric is very stretchy and almost too smooth for my taste, but that is just a personal preference.  My only complaint is that the top of the pocket is kind of just folded over and not stitched down.  It is OK, but it sort of looks unfinished to me.  That is a minor issue overall.

评论概述: The material does not go with this style of shirt
评论详情: This shirt felt like having elastic on.  The seams for the shoulders hung low and the sleeves where they meet the cuffs are very blousy, a look I'm not liking at all.  The seams are sewn well and no hanging threads, I just didn't like it.

评论概述: Sizing appears to be incorrect for my shipment
评论详情: I really wanted to like this top, it’s super soft and the blue color is really pretty. Considering all the other reviewers have talked about how it runs big and is oversized I’m pretty certain I did not receive the correct size top. It fits me on the snug side and doesn’t appear to be really meant for tall people. It looks boxy, too short and awkward. Additionally, there is a fold over on the pocket on the front of the shirt. Not sure how well that will wash or if it will have to be ironed to stay folded. All in all despite being a soft comfy material this top did not work for me.

This ANRABESS long sleeve top is just like the one I love to throw on for a lazy Saturday. It's super comfy and roomy without looking sloppy. When I first opened it, I thought the sleeves would be too short, but somehow they are not. It's an easy fit that is not too heavy or thick but still well made. This top washed well in cold and I hung it to dry. I am really pleased with this shirt. Highly recommend.

Oversized thin shirt made of Rayon 95% and 5% Elastane.  Lightweight.  Machine washable. I have washed mine, and it held up wonderfully. I air-dried the shirt.  Crew neck, long sleeve with cuffs, front bust patch pocket, and medium softness.  There are eight shirt colors to choose from.  It's a very comfy shirt to wear.  Highly recommend.

This "oversize" top is very oversize. I order a large in tops and this one is very large on me. If not for the cuffed sleeves, I would not be able to wear it. It is shapeless. It machine washed well and came out of the dryer in good shape, no need to iron. The fabric is very nice and soft.

Nice shirt. I love the dropped shoulders. The pocket has a little rolled edge to it, which gives it some dimension. I ordered the navy blue, and it is true to that color. But the best part for me is the material - lightweight, soft, breathable, slightly stretchy. I've not washed it yet, but it is all synthetic so it shouldn't shrink. That said, rayon doesn't like heat, so I will likely hang it to dry. When cooler weather arrives I feel sure this shirt will become a staple in my casual-wear rotation.
I love this shirt. It's one of my favorites. I may buy more in different colors, I like it so well. It's soft and fits true to size. The pocket on front adds a nice touch.

评论概述: The medium size is really big !
评论详情: I ordered a M my regular size. It’s really big. And not as nice as I thought it would be. I am returning.

评论概述: Better than the FP ls tee- a little stretch is stellar
评论详情: Love this long sleeve tee!  It is very similar to a Free People ls tee I've got, except its better in two ways- this one is less expensive, and this shirt has some stretch to it making it a perfect fit and incredibly comfortable.  True to size though I will say it's a few inches shorter than on the model, still a good length.  Washes well with minimal wrinkles.  The green color is vibrant without being "too much".  I'll be ordering more of these before I'd get the Free People version.
5star. 1 pocket, super soft and stretchy. Comfy

评论概述: Good go to shirt for your wardrobe
评论详情: I ordered this for my daughter and she loves it. She is a senior in high school now and very picky about her clothes. She loves the hot pink color. She stated the material is stretchy and comfortable and it fits true to size. Sleeves are just the right length. It held up well to washing and drying with little to no shrinking or fading. Is fit flattering and can really be dressed up or down. Overall based on quality price I believe it is a good value.
This shirt is exactly as expected. It’s loose fitting and casual but also comfortable.

This top is definitely over sized which is what I wanted. I ordered the blue and the color is very much a slate blue. The fabric is so soft and I have washed it a few times and it remains in tact and soft. Very nice top!

This shirt has a smooth, stretchy texture instead of cotton. I thought it might be too clingy, but it was fine.  It's very comfortable and fits true to size. I typically wear XL-XXL and I got the XL. I like the color. This will be nice to have in cooler temps.

Ouuu... I love the stretch in this fabric for this top. It's so comfortable, and the color is beautiful. I appreciate the reinforcement along the drop shoulders with added clear hanger loop straps, but mine came with a piece sticking out from one of the shoulders.

评论概述: Beautiful bright pink and so comfy
评论详情: Love this shirt! Thicker material than expected. Soft and cozy with an oversized look. The pink is bright and so fun!

If you’re looking for a cozy and fashionable top for the fall season, this long sleeve shirt is a great pick. The crewneck design is simple yet stylish, and the oversized fit gives it a relaxed, comfortable vibe.  The fabric is soft and perfect for layering over your favorite fall outfits. It’s a versatile piece that works well with jeans, leggings, or even as a casual layer under a jacket. I got it in the "lake" color and it's the same shade as the images. A beautiful blue green.  Overall, if you need a trendy and comfy shirt for cooler weather, this oversized crewneck top is definitely worth checking out! 🍂👕

Perfect for fall time coming up. It’s a thin, lightweight but cozy long sleeve! It can be tucked in or worn out, either way it looks really good and feels super cozy! It definitely is worth the price, I recommend it

评论概述: Womens loose fitted long sleeve shirt
评论详情: This is a well made shirt and is comfortable to wear. It is made to fit to size. It is well constructed. This is a recommended purchase.

I got the green shirt and it looks exactly as pictured. It's baggy, but I knew it was supposed to be like that. The color is nice and it feels soft. Not sure how it will hold up in the wash over time, but I always dry things on low, so hopefully it won't shrink!
